# Trade Expansion Over Time 

## developed: GDP per capita > .red[25k]

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=6, cache=T}
# install.packages('WDI')
library(tidyverse)
library(WDI)
library(ggplot2)

var = c('Trade.gdp' = 'NE.TRD.GNFS.ZS',
        'Trade.volumn' = 'BN.GSR.GNFS.CD',
        'GDPpc' = 'NY.GDP.PCAP.KD',
        'tariff' = 'TM.TAX.MRCH.SM.AR.ZS')

wdi <- WDI(indicator=var,
           start=1960,
           country = 'all',
           end=2020,
           extra=TRUE)

wdi %>% 
  drop_na(GDPpc) %>%
  mutate(developed = 
           case_when(GDPpc > 25000 ~ "developed",
                     GDPpc < 25000 ~ "underdeveloped"
                     )) -> wdi2

wdi2 %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, Trade.gdp, color=developed)) +
  geom_smooth(alpha=0.25, size=3) +
  labs(x="Year",
       y="Trade/GDP") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c("red", "blue")) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=13),
        axis.text=element_text(size=15),
        axis.title=element_text(size=15))

```

---
# When looking at poor countries only (GDP per capita < .red[10k])


```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=6, cache=T}
wdi2 %>%
  filter(GDPpc < 10000) %>%
  filter(Trade.gdp<200) %>%
  ggplot(aes(Trade.gdp, GDPpc)) +
  geom_smooth(alpha=0.25, size=3) +
  geom_point(alpha=0.1, color='red', size=2) +
  labs(y="GDP per capita",
       x="Trade/GDP") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=13),
        axis.text=element_text(size=15),
        axis.title=element_text(size=15))

```

# Trade Liberalization (average tariff rates)

### *extreme outliers are dropped*

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="asis", fig.width=16, fig.height=6, cache=T}
wdi2 %>%
  filter(year>1985) %>%
  filter(tariff<70) %>%
  ggplot(aes(year, tariff, color=developed)) +
  geom_smooth(alpha=0.25, size=3) +
  labs(x="Year",
       y="Tariff Rates") +
  geom_point(alpha=0.1, size=3) +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  scale_color_manual(values=c("red", "blue")) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size=13),
        axis.text=element_text(size=15),
        axis.title=element_text(size=15))
```
